entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Android precompile failed for visualstudio.rpccontracts.dll #11397
  • Selected item color 'CollectionView' in .NET 7. #11393
  • iOS app startup slow in debug #11392
  • Created an APK for Android - My phone says "This type of file is not supported" #11391
  • Circular progress animation of RefreshView keeps spinning even after all data has been successfully loaded #11388
    Backlog
  • MAUI 7.0 iOS Release build won't install on iOS 16 #11385
  • Intercepting requests from BlazorWebView #11382
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [iOS] MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() returns PNG in which the picture's Orientation Data is lost and difficult to obtain #11379
    Backlog
  • UIDeviceFamily 6 breaks Mac Catalyst UI #11377
    Backlog
  • Slow builds on Mac M1 #11376
    Backlog
  • Unable to click a MenuItem programmatically through UI Automation #11375
    Backlog
  • CollectionView shows no ScrollBar #11369
    Backlog
  • Building IOS Release generate error "the selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects" #11368
    Backlog
  • Build of MAUI app fails if NuGet package contains references #11364
    Backlog
  • [iOS] CollectionView inside RefreshView freezes app completely #11363
    Backlog
  • [IOS] Controllers do not appear on ContentPage Set FlowDirection Right To Left #11362

Closed

  • Label not changing text #11325
  • Android Entry control is covered by keyboard or the wrong Entry control is moved up to be visible. #6933
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Android] Entry control: Closing onscreen keyboard manually resizes modal page height #10978
    Backlog
  • [Android] Alert Dialog With Onscreen Keyboard Open Causes ScrollView Area to Cut Off #5721
    Backlog
  • [Android] Window currently doesn't apply AdjustPan so the view doesn't pan up (scroll) when the keyboard opens #11274
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Picker on windows not load in MVVM #11343
  • [IOS] Maui .Net7 Debug Crashing on Physical Device - The app has been terminated. #11324
  • Xcode 14.1 not compatible whit VS 2022 #11348
  • IOS Content and Controls inside Frame not Showing #11351
  • .NET MAUI App Icon and Splash screen cannot be customized #10949

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools #11396
  • Update Essentials Clipboard Docs #11395
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Browser API Docs #11394
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11390
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11389
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Manual update for .net8 sdk and workloads #11387
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Don't set editor action to handled #11386
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update Essentials Battery API Docs #11380
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Barometer API Docs #11378
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppInfo API Docs #11374
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials AppActions API Docs #11373
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Update Essentials Accelerometer API Docs #11370
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • Possible fix for issue #10960 #11361
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Reboot on-prem agent after job completion #11359
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Set window soft input via window mapper #11356
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.3.1 to 4.4.0 #11366
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.3 to 0.11.4 #11367
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.2.0 to 4.4.0 #11365
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add debug agent info #11347
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.1.5 to 1.2.221109.1 #11280
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] RadioButton a11y #10832
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix iOS/macOS Images not cropped inside of a Frame #6580 #11352
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Clean up the files in the xml-docs artifacts #11257
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove unnecessary MeasureOverride from RefreshView; #11357
    area/layout 🔲, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Vibrate - Detect zero duration and return early #11314
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Fix being unable to access some resources #11214
    area/Xaml </>, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10985
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
